price: (Loti) aravuga ati “Mu by’ukuri aba ni abashyitsi banjye; ntimunsebye!”
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ ضَيۡفِي فَلَا تَفۡضَحُونِ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qāla inna hāulāi ḍayfī falā tafḍaḥūni
